Question: The Baltimore Saturday Visiter awarded this person a prize in October 1833 for his short story "MS Found in a Bottle".
Hints: Originally, this person intended to call the journal The Penn, as it would have been based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
This person then returned to Richmond and resumed a relationship with his childhood sweetheart, Sarah Elmira Royster.
The bar where legend says this person was last seen drinking before his death still stands in Fells Point in Baltimore, Maryland.
